author: Dave Crane
comment: Watch does not wake up to alarms.  Goes off as soon as I interact with my watch in the morning :(
title: Misses alarms

author: Benjamin Cox
comment: Simple to use, and I love the different options for vibration pattern as well as dismiss method

author: John So
comment: Paid for this app to get advanced options and sadly there are none.. Would rate higher with advanced options
title: Advanced options....

author: William Israel
comment: This is by far the best Alarm I have found until daylight savings time happened all alarms are an hour off I know I can simply set each alarm ahead an hour bur seriously fix this please

reply.author: w9 software
reply.content: Thank you for you report. Issue should be fixed in 1.6 version.

title: Best Alarm but...

author: Michael Knyazev
comment: Please add setting to make the "Swipe" gesture DEFAULT to dismiss alarm
title: Default dismiss method swipe needed
